title: Teku fails if web3signer isn't up yet
body:
### Description

Teku `v23.8.0` fails but does not exit with `ERROR - PLEASE FIX OR REPORT | Unexpected exception thrown for validator-async-0` when starting it alongside web3signer and web3signer is not yet up. This keeps validators from being loaded, and Teku from executing their duties.

The parameters for remote signing are `--validators-external-signer-url http://web3signer:9000 --validators-external-signer-public-keys external-signer`

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)

- Configure Teku and web3signer
- Start both at the same time, so Teku looks for web3signer before it can respond

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]

Teku continues trying web3signer until it can be reached

**Frequency:** [How regularly does it occur?]

Reproducible

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: v23.8.0
* web3signer version: v23.6.0

### Logs

```
eth-docker-devel-consensus-1  | 2023-08-15 11:03:39.454 INFO  - Eth1 endpoint not provided, using execution engine endpoint for eth1 data
eth-docker-devel-consensus-1  | 2023-08-15 11:03:39.896 ERROR - External signer is currently not reachable at http://web3signer:9000
eth-docker-devel-consensus-1  | 2023-08-15 11:03:39.914 ERROR - External signer is currently not reachable at http://web3signer:9000
```
